chunks.zh: 房子适合什么时候入手？
chunks.en: When is the right time to buy a house?

chunks.zh: 房价跌了这么久了，但看网上的讨论全是未来十几年还会继续跌的，对于在外打工还没自己房子的看着他人的讨论感觉这辈子似乎都很难有买房子的时机了，v 友们对以后买房的时机有什么看法的？
chunks.en: House prices have been falling for so long, but online discussions are all about how they will continue to fall for the next ten years or more. For those who work away from home and don't yet have their own house, seeing other people's discussions makes it feel like there will never be an opportunity to buy a house in this lifetime. What are your thoughts on when to buy a house in the future?

chunks.zh: 别听网友说的，自己先去多去看看房子，了解各个区域的房价和规划再做打算真以为网友很懂啊🐶 https://v2ex.com/t/694263
chunks.en: Don't listen to what netizens say. Go and see more houses yourself first, understand the house prices and planning in various areas, and then make plans. Do you really think netizens know a lot? 🐶 https://v2ex.com/t/694263

chunks.zh: 2015 年认为房价会永远涨。
chunks.en: In 2015, people thought house prices would rise forever.

chunks.zh: 2025 年认为房价会永远跌。
chunks.en: In 2025, people think house prices will fall forever.

chunks.zh: 说上面两种话的，很可能是同一拨人。
chunks.en: It is very likely that the people who say the above two things are the same group of people.

chunks.zh: 想买就是现在。
chunks.en: If you want to buy, now is the time.

chunks.zh: 不想买啥时候都不是时候
chunks.en: If you don't want to buy, there's never a good time.

chunks.zh: 如果是自住 就在需要的时候，如果是投资 ……
chunks.en: If it's for your own residence, buy when you need it. If it's for investment...

chunks.zh: 普通人还想买到最低点？
chunks.en: Do ordinary people still want to buy at the lowest point?

chunks.zh: 别做梦了，如果有这本事选择几个股票低点买入
chunks.en: Don't dream about it. If you have this ability, choose a few stock low points to buy.

chunks.zh: 再看看吧
chunks.en: Let's wait and see.

chunks.zh: 重庆这边，不少地方现在房贷比租金都便宜了。
chunks.en: In Chongqing, mortgage payments are now cheaper than rent in many places.

chunks.zh: 多等一年，房租那是实打实的给房东送去了。
chunks.en: If you wait another year, the rent will be a real gift to the landlord.
Around 2027-2028

chunks.zh: 你往前翻翻这类帖子，就知道这里大部分人都没啥正确的判断，有正确判断的也多是瞎猫碰上死耗子。
chunks.en: If you flip through these types of posts, you will know that most people here don't have a correct judgment, and those who have a correct judgment are mostly just lucky.

chunks.zh: 这里的人回复没啥参考意义，否则股市就没人赔了。
chunks.en: The replies from people here are not very useful for reference, otherwise no one would lose money in the stock market.

chunks.zh: 价格在自己能承受的范围内就能出手 选自己喜欢的 别将就 入场了就别关注价格 多关注关注怎么住得舒服些
chunks.en: You can buy it if the price is within your affordability. Choose what you like, don't settle for less. Once you enter the market, don't pay attention to the price, pay more attention to how to live comfortably.

chunks.zh: 其实也没跌多久 不过这个地方就讲究一个快字。
chunks.en: Actually, it hasn't fallen for long, but this place emphasizes speed.

chunks.zh: 这才几年 婚育 出生人口都崩盘了 论坛里都有老登出来劝生了 你敢信？
chunks.en: It's only been a few years, and marriage, childbirth, and birth rates have all collapsed. There are even old guys in the forum coming out to persuade people to have children. Can you believe it?

chunks.zh: 肛需可以买，一手别指望便宜（正虎控着） 2 手可以 开天杀价。
chunks.en: You can buy if you need it. Don't expect new houses to be cheap (the government is controlling them). You can bargain aggressively for used houses.

chunks.zh: 现在是买方市场
chunks.en: It is a buyer's market now.

chunks.zh: 刚需随时买，买了就别看价格了。
chunks.en: Buy when you need it, and don't look at the price after buying.

chunks.zh: 现在很多有贷款的房子是负资产了，未来只会越来越便宜，可以大力的砍价。
chunks.en: Many houses with loans are now negative assets, and they will only become cheaper in the future. You can bargain aggressively.

chunks.zh: 手头钱充裕的时候，如果硬要掏空 6 个钱包感觉什么时候都不合适，毕竟失业率和就业率摆在那儿
chunks.en: When you have enough money on hand, it doesn't feel like the right time to empty six wallets, after all, the unemployment rate and employment rate are there.

chunks.zh: 现在好的二手房和一手价格就这样了。
chunks.en: The prices of good used and new houses are like this now.

chunks.zh: 你要买 10 年左右的二手房可以杀价。
chunks.en: You can bargain for used houses that are about 10 years old.

chunks.zh: 现在已经很低了，快回到 16/17 年的水平了。
chunks.en: It's already very low now, and it's almost back to the level of 2016/17.

chunks.zh: 没人能从鱼头吃到鱼尾。
chunks.en: No one can eat from the head to the tail of the fish (catch the absolute bottom/top).

chunks.zh: 不说哪里，就是空谈，上海连续成交火热，那就是不少买家觉得价格到位了
chunks.en: It's just empty talk if you don't say where. Shanghai's continuous hot transactions mean that many buyers think the price is right.

chunks.zh: 对我来说，在上海，房龄<20 年，且租售比<500 的时候
chunks.en: For me, in Shanghai, when the house age is less than 20 years and the rent-to-sale ratio is less than 500.

chunks.zh: 估计会掉到 14-15 年那时候的价格，现在不是最佳时机啊
chunks.en: It is estimated that it will fall to the price of 2014-15, now is not the best time.
